page.title: 16GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Most children like to play rounders and tig. Tig is a game of catch where one person is 'on' and he/she has to touch or 'tig' someone else. The person who is 'tigged' is then 'on' and so on. They also play football and cricket at school. The younger girls play with jigsaws, use typewriters, draw and make books. The boys like playing wallball and spotting cars. With friends they play marbles, boardgames, badminton and tennis. These are raquet games. At home girls play games like Monopoly. Other board games include Formula One and Ludo. Boys like art work, reading, playing, badminton, golf, gardening, fishing and making things. Girls like visiting relations going out for meals.Children don't like having their hair washed, going to bed or getting up.
